data.text: @pdfenwick You're aware that influenza cases dropped at the same rate in non- masking Sweden?
@GovGone When you understand that the past 2 years hasn't been about health but about control, everything makes sense. It's the flu, people!

@GovGone @UntilIcanthink They work for both. COVID would have spread worse if it hadn’t been for the masking. Even if masking is minimally helpful; much of medical practice is risk vs reward. Masking carries zero risk so why not use them if they might work.

@GovGone @pdfenwick He is a troll.
Place on ignore, my friend.
@pdfenwick @UntilIcanthink Let me guess. Masks worked for the flu but not Covid 🥱
@GovGone @UntilIcanthink And you have no IDEA how stupid this makes you look. SMH
@GovGone One of these years, this may become safe to broach in mainstream circles, I believe there is something there, there personally.
@GovGone @TaxLivestockRus You can't test a non existent bug with a test not testing for a non existent bug !!!

@GovGone Masks and washing hands stopped the flu (which has been around for centuries) but didn’t stop Covid.

Can’t understand how people still buy that
